#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t ; 
	cin >> t ; 
	while ( t-- )
	{
		int n ;
		cin >> n ; 
		int flag = 1 ;
		for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ )
		{
			int sum = i ;
			int j = i ;
			while ( j != 0 )
			{
				sum += j % 10 ;
				j /= 10 ;
			}
			if ( sum == n )
			{
				cout << i << endl ;
				flag = 0 ;
				break ;
			}
		}
		if ( flag == 1 )
			cout << "NONE" << endl ;
	}
	return 0;
}
